name: Taplands
description:
Explore the world of taplands, find a perfect location for your city and maximize your production by upgrading your city wisely. Your empire keeps growing while you are away so make sure to check in often! Taplands, run an empire..while sleeping.

I wanted to make an "idle Civilization" type of game. An idle game where there are many different paths to follow and and it's not just about buying more stuff to get more production. Your choices should matter and every game should be different.

Taplands is still in development. All feedback is super helpful and welcome.

Taplands features:

- A strategic idle game.

- A colorful randomized world to explore.

- Many improvements that unlock when your empire grows.

- Different terrain types for endless combinations of cities.

- Multiple strategic routes to optimize your cities production.
